General Information About Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
38 U.S.C. 1151
provides for the payment of compensation for additional disability or death proximately caused by
Department of Veterans Affairs (VA)
hospital care
medical or surgical treatment, or
examination
participation in vocational rehabilitation training, or
participation in compensated work therapy.
Disabilities and/or causes of death recognized under this provision of law are compensated “
as if
” service-connected (SC), but are
not
actually SC.
entitlement to benefits under
38 U.S.C. 1151
, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 6.B
, and
considering direct and presumptive service connection in 1151 claims, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 6.B.6.a
.
